overview: Joanna Angel's Guide 2 Humping documents the experience of a sex seminar hosted by everyone's favorite porn star, Ms. Joanna Angel. The student with the highest score on the final exam is allowed to practice his (or her) new found skills on the teacher. Things take an interesting turn when the class' biggest trouble maker (James Deen) makes the grade....
title: Joanna Angel's Guide 2 Humping
